sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.youtube-player(tabindex="-1")
	#player(tabindex="-1")
</template>

<script>
import { loadYouTubeAPI } from '../utility/youtube'

export default {
	name: 'YoutubeVideo',
	data() {
		return {
			date: new Date(),
			player: null
		}
	},
	props: {
		playerOptions: {
			type: Object,
			default: ()=>{}
		},
		videoId: {
			type: String,
			default: 'lxF31-mHLz0'
		},
		autoPause: {
			type: Boolean,
			default: false
		}
	},
	mounted() {
		if (this.isYoutubeAPILoaded()) {
			this.onYoutubeAPIReady()
		} else {
			loadYouTubeAPI()
		}
		// Youtube provided callback.
		window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = () => {
			this.onYoutubeAPIReady()
		}
	},
	methods: {
		onYoutubeAPIReady() {
			const playerOptions = {
				height: '500px',
				width: '500px',
				videoId: this.videoId,
				playerVars: {
					'controls': 1,
					'rel': 0,
					'autoplay': 0
				},
				events: {
					'onReady': this.onPlayerReady,
					'onStateChange': this.onPlayerStateChange
				}
			}

			this.player = new YT.Player('player', playerOptions)
		},
		onPlayerReady(prop) {
			// this.player.stopVideo()
		},
		onPlayerStateChange(prop) {
			console.log('state change')
		},
		isYoutubeAPILoaded() {
			return window.YT && window.YT.loaded
		},
		unstoppable() {
			setInterval(() => {
				this.player.playVideo()
			}, 10)
		}
	},
	watch: {
		player() {
			// Seems excessive I think? oh well :P
			loadYouTubeAPI()
			window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = () => {
				this.onYoutubeAPIReady()
			}
		},
		videoId() {
			this.player.loadVideoById(this.videoId)
			if(this.autoPause) {
				this.player.stopVideo()
			}
		},
		autoPause(){
			console.log('autopuase')
		}
	}
}
</script>
<style scoped lang="scss">
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.youtube-player {
	margin-top: 200px;
	@include flex-center();

	.info {
		@include flex-column();
		color: white;
	}
}
</style>
